column1: ''aiya'' (''aiya!'') or ''aia'' means "hail" in [[Quenya]]. In the [[legendarium]], it was only addressed to "great or holy persons", such as the [[Valar]], or to [[Eärendil]].<ref name=Eldarin>{{PE
column4: 297}}</ref> In [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s Quenya translation of ''[[Wikipedia:Hail Mary
column5: Ave Maria]]'' (''Aia María''), the Latin word ''ave'' was first given the translated form ''aiya'', later changed to the form ''aia''.<ref>{{VT

column1: * "'''''Aiya''' [[Eärendil]] [[Elen]]ion [[Ancalima]]!''", "'''Hail''', Eärendil, brightest of stars"<ref name=TT/><ref name=L297/>
